output: In Carsoli, Italy, over the course of a week starting from February 3rd to February 7th, there will be clear skies and clouds with varying coverage throughout each day. On Monday, cloud cover ranges between none at night transitioning into scattered clouds by evening, accompanied by gentle winds up to speed of 2.41 m/s in the afternoon. Tuesday begins similarly but sees an increase in temperature from a low of 3°C during the early morning to around 10.14°C at noon under mostly cloudy conditions with occasional gusts reaching speeds up to 1.92 m/s by mid-afternoon, and then clears again towards evening. Wednesday maintains clear skies throughout but sees a slight increase in temperature peaking at around 12°C during the noon hour before cooling down slightly for the rest of the day with wind speeds varying between 75 to 307 degrees per hour and gusts up to 2.83 m/s by evening. Thursday continues this pattern, but experiences stronger breezes reaching a speed of up to 2.41 m/s in the afternoon under clear skies with temperatures peaking at around 11.68°C and wind gusting up to 0.95 m/s by evening time. Finally on Friday, cloud coverage increases significantly from none early morning through scattered clouds later into a mix of few and broken ones as the day progresses while temperature ranges between approximately 3°C in the cooler parts of the day reaching around 10.93°C at its warmest point with wind speeds up to 2.77 m/s by afternoon, suggesting variable weather conditions ahead.
